reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made with a lovely ribbed texture and buttery feel against the skin. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful texture and color
items.body: I purchased this sweater to go with a dress as it gets chilly here in the mornings and evening with the marine layer. Super soft with a great textured look gives it a sophisticated and contemporary design thatâ€™s perfect for layering with a causal outfit you want to level up or like Iâ€™m doing with my dress for a local concert. The size is true to fit. I havenâ€™t purchased from this brand before but definitely will look at their offerings in the future due to the quality and style! Definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: Jenâ€™s Recommendations

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater!
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater! The material is soft and a little on the heavier side! The ribbing detail adds so much! The cost is a bit higher that I normally pay for but I'm glad I decided to purchase two of these! For reference, I'm 5 ft tall and around 115 lbs. I ordered the camel color in an XS and the blue in a small. Both fit perfect! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs slightly big, great material
items.body: I bought this sweater twice. The first 2 pictures show 3 tiny stains on the front of the 1st sweater. The 2nd came & had no stains. The sweater is thicker than I expected but in a good way. The material is very soft and comfortable. I feel like it runs a little big though. I ordered a small & it still had plenty of extra room. I would like an extra small but it's not available in that size. I didn't love the apricot color, it was a bit too yellowish peach. I ended up sending it back. It's a nice sweater but I just wish it was a bit smaller. For reference I'm 5'2 125 lbs. Read more
items.author: Washington Gal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable sweater
items.body: Warm, soft, comfortable, great fit. Can dress up or down. Read more
items.author: Laura Grant

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color swatches not accurate
items.body: Overall the shirt is comfy and nice and thick (but not hot feeling). I returned the Solid Camel because the color was not at all as pictured (see example vs. actual image). It has a great "weight" to it and a large fits well (I'm 5'10" and it's a good length). Will try a different color to see how it works out. Read more
items.author: Jolanthe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product ðŸ¥°
items.body: Loved them. I ordered two different colors. The fit, fabric, length and warmth were perfect for my trip. I would highly recommend this product. Kathy WE Read more
items.author: Frequent Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice warm sweater
items.body: This sweater is so cute on. I love the dark green color and the material is soft and durable. It's the perfect thickness and makes me feel put together when I wear it. Great purchase! Read more
items.author: Erin T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: First. The inside is knitted so itâ€™s incredibly soft in the inside while the texture is on the outside. Second. Itâ€™s so comfy. Just warm enough for a cooler Florida day without being hot. If you live in Florida you know it can be freezing in the morning and then boiling in the afternoon. I got a ton of compliments on this sweater when I wore it too. The white with black stripe is a winter white/ off white color. Not a true white. Which is a better color IMHO. I definitely will buy another. I got an XL and it was oversized but perfect arm length and shoulder fit. Then loser through the body. So with fitted pants it looked super cute. All in all this is a win. I will update after I wash it on the event it doesnâ€™t wash well but Iâ€™ve bought this brand before and am usually always happy, especially for the price! Read more
items.author: Jes-se

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Striped Navy White, Striped Black White, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Apricot, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Orange, Rose Red, Royal Blue, Orange Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
